meter_reading.notes: Meter orientation check: BADGER METER text at top, digital display readable left-to-right. White digits (5 digits on left): 0 2 2 7 1 = 2271 m³. Black digit (single digit on right, separated): 1 = 0.1 m³. Red dial analysis: Dial orientation: '0' mark at top of dial, '5' mark at bottom of dial. Dial number scale position: pointing between 1 and 2, approximately at 1.4 on dial scale. Clock position: between 1 and 2 o'clock. Degrees: 50° (pointing UP-RIGHT). Verification: Hand is pointing UP-RIGHT ✓. Dial reading: 50/3600 = 0.014 m³. Total: 2271.114 m³. Image is slightly blurry but all components are identifiable. The red sweep hand appears to be positioned between the 1 and 2 marks on the dial face, closer to the midpoint.
